name: Mangotron
description:
You awake in a dark neon world the only way you can escape is to complete the challenges set before you. Be warned, these appealing neon objects may look striking but a single stroke and you lose not only the challenge but your life! Can you discover the correct sequence of paths and use the wait ability to bide your time in order to see your way to safety? Try this brain teasing puzzle game to find out.

In this game there are ample puzzle maps to test your wits as you plot your path to the exit. Simply scroll around the map and tap anywhere in the orange fields to mark your route. You can use the walls as cover and the wait ability to avoid the various neon systems as a single hit will take you right back to the start. With no time pressure and an unlimited number of attempts to complete each level you can enjoy the challenge without the stress.  But, can you remember which series of paths and pauses worked and which ones failed?

Features

  • Varied puzzle maps
  • Colourful graphics
  • Simple game play
  • Rewarding challenges
  • Great exercise for the brain
  • Play offline
  • Casual fun
  • Play at your own pace
  • Atmospheric soundtrack
  • Unlimited attempts for each level
  • Available in multiple languages
